metadata.title: USN-5274-1 -- Simple DirectMedia Layer vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Simple DirectMedia Layer library incorrectly handled memory when parsing certain specially crafted .BMP files. An attacker could possibly use these issues to crash the application or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5274-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libsdl2-2.0-0 - 2.0.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.18.04.4+esm1 libsdl2-doc - 2.0.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.18.04.4+esm1 libsdl2-dev - 2.0.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.18.04.4+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
